SEARCH
Package com.project.moviebooking.service

Interface BookingService

All Known Implementing Classes:
BookingServiceImpl
public interface BookingService
Service interface defining operations related to bookings within the movie booking system.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Booking
    createBooking(BookingRequest bookingRequest)
    Creates a booking based on the provided booking request.
    List<BookingResponse>
    getAllBookingsByUsername(String username)
    Retrieves all bookings for a specific username.
    List<BookingResponse>
    getAllBookingsByUsername(String username, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
    Retrieves paginated bookings for a specific username.

  • Method Details

    • createBooking

      Booking createBooking(BookingRequest bookingRequest) throws BookedSeatsNotFoundException, BookedSeatsOverlap
      Creates a booking based on the provided booking request.
      Parameters:
      bookingRequest - The details of the booking to be created.
      Returns:
      The created booking.
      Throws:
      BookedSeatsNotFoundException - If booked seats are not found.
      BookedSeatsOverlap - If booked seats overlap.

    • getAllBookingsByUsername

      List<BookingResponse> getAllBookingsByUsername(String username)
      Retrieves all bookings for a specific username.
      Parameters:
      username - The username for which bookings are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of booking responses associated with the provided username.

    • getAllBookingsByUsername

      List<BookingResponse> getAllBookingsByUsername(String username, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Retrieves paginated bookings for a specific username.
      Parameters:
      username - The username for which bookings are to be retrieved.
      pageable - Pagination information.
      Returns:
      A list of paginated booking responses associated with the provided username.
